TextBlock.Text: Components: All available functioning gravity crystals, 1 white hole warp core.
Suitable warp core obtained from paired white hole and black hole warp cores powering the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color>.
This will disable the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> indefinitely.. But I believe that to be of little importance now.
Structure: Gravity crystals will be arranged in a compact inward lattice surrounding the warp core. Remaining external crystals to be used in stabilizing flight trajectory.
Of note: Amount of gravity crystals insufficient to complete lattice at front of structure. Care must be taken to minimize entry points in this section.
An update: I am ready to launch the Inspired at last.
Even if I could not find the closure I sought... I am confident in my decision.
